settings.textBelowImg: (The design and characters displayed on the screen are simulations. The color and position of the engraving may differ from the actual ones.)

settings.title: About the finish
settings.bodyText:
-Printing is done with a laser engraving machine. In actual products, the appearance of colors differs depending on the amount of light and the angle.

・ We will process it on the front of the main body. The back (opposite side) has the KINTO original logo mark.

-The size and position of the engraving are determined for each shape of the main body.

-The color of the engraving is determined for each color of the main body.

-The design and characters displayed on the screen are simulations. The color and position of the engraving may differ from the actual one.

-Colors may look different depending on your monitor and browser environment.

・ Even if you purchase multiple units of the same color, the finished color of the engraving may differ slightly.

・ Since each item is manually processed, some distortion or deviation may be seen.

・ This service is available only at the time of purchase and cannot be processed into products that have already been used.

・ Cancellation after ordering cannot be accepted.

settings.title: Specifications
settings.bodyText:
- 74 x H197 mm / 500 ml / approx. 310 g

-Height of the main body (without lid and spout) H173 mm

settings.title: Care Instructions
settings.bodyText:
Product Name: Stainless Steel Portable Thermos / Material: 18-8 Stainless Steel, Polypropylene, Silicone Rubber / BPA Free / Made in China / Heat Insulation Effect: 69 ℃ or more (6 hours) / Cold Insulation Effect: 7 ℃ or less (6 hours) * Insulation Efficacy refers to the temperature of hot water measured 6 hours after pouring hot water into the product at room temperature of 20 ° C ± 2 ° C and closing the lid when the hot water temperature reaches 95 ° C ± 1 ° C. * Cold insulation effect refers to the temperature of water measured 6 hours after putting cold water in the product at room temperature of 20 ° C ± 2 ° C and closing the lid when the water temperature reaches 4 ° C ± 1 ° C. * Before adding beverages, add a small amount of hot water (cold water) and preheat (pre-cool) for about 1-2 minutes to increase the heat retention (cold) effect.

- This product is a beverage bottle

- Cannot be used in microwave ovens, ovens, dishwashers / dryers

- Please do not put it near the fire

- Please do not boil and wash

- Keep out of reach of children

- Do not drop or subject it to strong impact as it may cause damage or water leakage.

- Do not put dry ice or carbonated drinks in the container as it may expand and cause damage or injury.

- Please be careful not to overfill the beverage as it may overflow when closing the spout parts.

- If rust-like spots adhere to the inside of the container, add lukewarm water and about 10% citric acid, wash with a soft sponge after 2-3 hours, and rinse thoroughly.
